select tdr.report_id as reportId, tr.report_name as reportName, td.doctor_id as doctorId, td.doctor_name as doctorName, (select count(trs.scale_id) from tb_report_scale trs where report_id = tr.report_id) as scaleNum from tb_doctor_report tdr left join tb_report tr on tdr.report_id = tr.report_id left join tb_doctor td on tdr.doctor_id = td.doctor_id where tdr.doctor_id = #{doctorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and tr.report_name like concat('%', #{reportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
select tr.report_id, tr.report_name, tr.create_time, tr.update_time from tb_report tr where tr.report_id = #{reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
